citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1400 on
05-DEC-16.
Inspector stopped at the facility and knocked at the door. Called number on file and left a message. Received a
return call stating that they were out of town and would not be back that day. Inspector left facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1400 on
05-DEC-16.
     Inspector stopped at the facility and knocked at the door. Called number on file and left a message. Received a
return call stating that they were out of town and would not be back that day. Inspector left facility.
